Part 1

```{r}
read_lines("input12022.txt") -> calories
calories
```

```{r}
calories |>
  as.tibble() |>
  mutate(group = cumsum(value == "")) |>
  mutate(value = as.numeric(value)) |>    
  group_by(group) |>                      
  summarise(total = sum(value, na.rm = TRUE))
```
